CommunityThemeDefinition.description: A fully packaged theme for the Australian state Government of Victoria with the Ripple v2 Design System.

bundlesInfo.title: Distinctly VIC Government
bundlesInfo.description: This template gives your portal a distincly VIC Government look and feel and helps digital product teams create a good customer experience quickly.

bundlesInfo.title: Wide component range
bundlesInfo.description: A range of common tried and tested design components lets you build your website or service in record time.

bundlesInfo.title: Accessible and compliant
bundlesInfo.description: Meet branding and WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility guidelines, and follow VIC design standards for user needs.
